author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Drake Promises He's Finishing "More Life"
text:
A post shared by Drake's #1 Fan (@aboodovo) on Mar 10, 2017 at 4:13pm PST 4 
Hamburg, Germany – Is anybody still waiting for More Life ? 
Well, for those die-hard Drake fans, Drizzy himself promised that he is finishing the playlist. At a Boy Meets World Tour stop in Hamburg, Germany last night, the Toronto superstar gave yet another update on the project. 
“I know it’s taken me a while, but I’m going to the hotel tonight to finish this More Life shit so I can give it to you as soon as possible,” he shares to much applause. 
The music has been delayed multiple times and fans were teased that it would be released March 4. The latest reports say that Drake is dropping something this weekend . 
Don’t hold your breath and check out the release date history for More Life here . Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You! Thank You!
